name: Hotel Aqua

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have been to Aqua before so i knew what to expect and can i say it was even better, food was excellent with plenty of choices at every meal, staff where always pleasant and went out of their way to help, hotel is immaculate both inside and out, animation team were great and always about day and night and pool attendant was fab. Hotel is best in Icemelar and i would recommend this hotel to everyone. We stayed at Aqua for 5 days then went to Grand Azure Marmaris for 4 days, Aqua would win hands down all day long, please read my review on above hotel.
reviews.title: excellent hotel would highly recommend

reviews.text: We have just returned from an 11 night stay at the hotel Aqua. After our journey from Bristol to Icmeler we recieved a warm welcome in the hotels beautiful and spacious lobby and were given all the info we needed to start our holiday- a cold meze plate had been set aside for us in the dining room but we didnt take advantage of this as we put our son straight to bed. Room was good size and a gorgeous view over the pool and the bay of Icmeler from the balcony.
reviews.title: Best in the area- fab holiday!
Amazing
reviews.text: Cleanliness and efficiency of cleaners was really good and luckily our room was cleaned early while we were out in the morning. When we went down to breakfast we were impressed by the sizeable buffet- spread through the dining room one area for hot foods, one for cold and one for the gorgeous breads and pastries... dinner was equally pleasing- masses of choice and amazing turkish mezes you wouldnt find if you went to one of the touristy restaurants in the resort. Look forward to our evening meal every night and was never dissapointed.

After speaking to various people in the area it became apparent that the Aqua has a very good reputation and is highly renowned in the vicinity as offering very high standards. The location of the hotel is unsurpassed- sitting bang in the middle of the bay and taking advantage of the superb panormic views of the bay of Icmeler.
reviews.title: Fabulous Friendly Hotel with Perfect Location

reviews.text: I travelled with Thomas Cook- Manos brand and the brochure does not do it justice at all. The hotel is located between the; L'etoile which is more enclosed and set back from the seafront- no open aspect; and the Marti la Perla- entertainment and music was played far too loudly and I was so pleased to have chosen the Aqua. Genuinely a great hotel- the staff at reception were very good and the restaurant staff were attentive and offered a friendly welcome every evening- especially Ali!!
reviews.title: The Best Hotel in Turkey!

reviews.text: Having stayed at many hotels around the world, Europe, Caribbean, USA etc this was our first time in Turkey - never really fancied it previously to be honest, therefore we were very pleasantly surprised when we arrived in Icmeler.
reviews.title: Hit The Spot

reviews.title: aqua deluxe hotel icmeler

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 2 weeks half board plus at this lovely hotel which is in the best location and right by the beach. Broadband, room safe and air conditioning are all in the price. Nice pool with ample sunbeds and attractive gardens and water displays. Friendly, hardworking, staff provide good food and service. The rooms and facilities are good with balconies constructed to give adequate privacy and views. Large reception areas and lounges and sensible no smoking policy, where required. Plenty of entertainment if needed.
reviews.title: Superb Hotel Aqua

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just back from an enjoyable 7-day end of season break at the Aqua. We booked the package through Thomas Cook and stayed on a 'half board plus' basis meaning that we received complimentary wine / drinks with our evening meal but otherwise had to pay for drinks / coffee in the bar etc. All-inclusive deals were available as well. During our stay in the third week of October temperatures were still in the high twenties and low thirties with a regular breeze from the sea.
reviews.title: Good Value Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Aqua is a typical package deal 5 star hotel with some aspects verging on true 5 star quality and others falling short of the mark but still good or adequate. During our stay the guests seemed to be predominantly German and British with a few Dutch and other nationalities. In the main the guests were middle aged and elderly couples or groups but there were a few families as well. Most of the staff were very friendly and welcoming and able to communicate adequately in both German and English. It was evident that one or two couples were regular guests at the Aqua and were well known to the longer serving staff who went out of their way to welcome them and spend time chatting.
reviews.title: Beautiful Icmeler / Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The public areas of the hotel are very nice, reflecting the art deco design of the building and were well maintained and very clean. A spacious and airy reception area with a lobby bar, additional cafe area with large screen TV, two snooker tables and quiet reading area with a small library stocked with paperbacks left by previous guests. The grounds and pool area are very pleasant with an outside bar / entertainments area (see photos). The rear of the hotel borders the seafront walkway with a large exclusive sunbed / beach area. The hotel supplies free towels for both pool and beach with each guest having their own towel card which can be exchanged for towels from the poolside attendant.
reviews.title: Perfect Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In general the corridor and room carpets were a wee bit tired and beginning to pick up a few stains but still clean and functional. We had an ' inward facing' (I suppose pool view) room on the second floor. The bedroom was adequately sized with plain decor and was probably UK four star standard. There were two single beds pushed together with a single fleecy blanket and single pillow on each (no spares in the room). The room amenities were good with several English speaking channels on the TV, a mini bar, room safe, plenty cupboard and drawer space and all the usual extras one expects of a good standard hotel. The balcony was adequate with two chairs and a table and a retractable clothes-drying rack. The Bathroom was small and functional with a small bath and bath shower, toilet and washbasin. The tiles and grouting were a wee bit tired and the bath sealant and wall tiles roughly applied. I have seen nicer bathrooms in three star establishments however it was cleaned daily and served its purpose adequately.
reviews.title: A lovely Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: i agree with the other reviews, the beds are wonderful as are the pillows. lovley big room nice bathroom, lovley position and fab grounds. good breakfast. BUT. the evening meals were horrid apart from the sweets. not once did we have a pice of meat that wasnt in some slop. plenty of fish cooked on request. if you like fish. B and B. BEST OPTION FOR THIS HOTEL IN MY OPINION.
reviews.title: the food lets this hotel down

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My daughter went there seven years ago for her honeymoon and recommended it to us and we were not disappointed.
reviews.title: Ideal location for a beach holiday

reviews.text: The staff cannot do enough for you and the food is superb. Every morning there was a choice of cold meats, cheese and salad or prunes and gorgeous apricots and yogurts. Also you could get a freshly cooked omelette or fried egg cooked to your liking, also freshly cooked pancakes.. The bread was to die for and always plenty of coffee and tea machines to help yourself. We had fresh strawberries several times and the sweets were out of this world. Always ice cream if you wanted it.In the evening.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, good location, great service

reviews.text: Men were asked to wear long trousers and shorts were not allowed but unfortunately in spite of the many notices outside the restaurant and in the lift there was the minority who defied the rules and still wore shorts but I am told they are working on this. The lovely grounds feature waterfalls and streams with little bridges over them and you have easy access to the beach which is only a few yards away.
reviews.title: Wish I was back there...

description: Situated on the wide sweep of Icmeler's sand shingle beach, the stylish Hotel Aqua combine s high standards and a touch of old-school Hollywood glamour with a wide range of facilities amd appeals particularly to couples. The impressive reception, with classic American cars outside. Opens onto lovely gardens with spectacular views across the bay.
